    • openNewWindow

      DomWindowProxy openNewWindow(String name, String relativeUrl) throws IOException, SAXException
      Open new window.
      Parameters:
      name - the name
      relativeUrl - the relative url
      Returns:
      the dom window proxy
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
      SAXException - the SAX exception

    • replaceText

      boolean replaceText(String text, String contentType)
      Replaces the text in the window with the specified text and content type. Returns false if unable to do the replacement.
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      contentType - the content type
      Returns:
      true, if successful

    • submitRequest

      DomWindowProxy submitRequest(HTMLElementImpl sourceElement, String method, String location, String target, MessageBody requestBody) throws IOException, SAXException
      Submit request.
      Parameters:
      sourceElement - the source element
      method - the method
      location - the location
      target - the target
      requestBody - the request body
      Returns:
      the dom window proxy
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
      SAXException - the SAX exception
